company_name: METALLGIESSEREI WERNER SCHIERMANN GMBH & CO. KG
supplier_of: iron, special grade and pig iron | steel | aluminium and aluminium alloys | foundries, aluminium | metals, precious and special
information: The company METALLGIESSEREI WERNER SCHIERMANN GMBH & CO. KG, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1957, which operates in the Steel industry. It also operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron, Aluminium and aluminium alloys, Foundries, aluminium, and Metals, precious and special industries. It is based in Nordstemmen, Germany.
keywords: Steel, Iron, special grade and pig iron, Aluminium and aluminium alloys, Foundries, aluminium, Metals, precious and special
